revised_title: The Significance of Barometer Effect in Penetrating Showers
tldr: The authors studied the correlation between barometric pressure and intensity of penetrating showers. They found a barometer effect of around 10% per cm, which is larger than the effect of ordinary cosmic rays. The authors also concluded that the absorption of primaries in air is ten times larger than in lead, which can be explained by an exponential absorption model.
